alert.note: Alert for Butler; Clermont; Hamilton; Warren (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 06 at 4:32PM EDT until June 06 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN HAMILTON...EASTERN BUTLER...NORTHWESTERN CLERMONT AND WARREN COUNTIES... At 432 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lebanon, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Middletown, Mason, Lebanon, Springboro, Sharonville, Monroe, Blue Ash, Loveland, Trenton, Franklin, Montgomery, Milford, Carlisle, South Middletown, West Chester, Morrow, Seven Mile, Highpoint, Remington and Hunter. This includes the following Interstates... I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 17 and 37. I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 20 and 39. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
